snippet.title: Chrono Sword - 2019 May fix
snippet.description:
Chrono Sword is a pixel art souls-like action adventure game with time travel.

You will face the incredible atmosphere in pixel art, and will be surprise by the fluid character animations in every directions. The world is built with multiple floors, so that you can explore the inside and the outside of the world.

The combat is based on attack, dodge and shield like Dark Souls, but there are contextual actions like The Last of Us. You can fight like a skillful expert with combinations of basic actions and contextual actions, without memorizing long skill list. Every combat is so fluid.

And there are charming characters and epic story. You will be a heroine who lost own memory, and have to travel the present and the past of the fallen world to reclaim it. Your choice makes change of the story.
